articles.title: Ather Rizta electric scooter launched in India at ₹1,09,999: From Stack 6 to Halo smart helmet, everything announced | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Ather Energy introduces the Ather Rizta electric scooter, boasting enhanced design and technology features. With competitive pricing starting at  ₹1.10 lakh, it competes with key players. Ather Stack 6 updates offer improved functionality and connectivity for…
articles.content: Ather Energy has unveiled its latest addition to the electric scooter market, introducing the Ather Rizta. Priced competitively at 1.10 lakh onwards (introductory, ex-showroom, Bengaluru), the bookin… [+4597 chars]

articles.title: US avoids 'digital security crisis' after developer uncovers sabotage in software - Fox News
articles.description: A Microsoft software developer reportedly uncovered a deliberate act of sabotage within a program, sparking alarm among tech leaders and U.S. government officials.
articles.content:
